LLM_Sentence: according to the complaint, southwest has been denying some of its workers in oakland the right to use earned paid sick leave.
the city claims that southwest has also retaliated against workers who tried to use their leave and discouraged them from filing complaints with the city.

in december 2020, the city and southwest signed a settlement in which, among other things, the airline agreed to fully restore the sick leave hours it had canceled for certain workers between 2017 and 2020.
